alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Harrison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 8:24PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Harrison and southeastern Hancock Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 824 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Long Beach, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gulfport, Biloxi, Long Beach, Bay St. Louis, Diamondhead and Gulfport Airport. This includes Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 16 and 41. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
